en-EN.f_list: File list in the current folder:
en-EN.stp2: Define what the headers/keys correspond to
en-EN.df1: None: the header will not be used.
en-EN.df2: Temperature: this column will be used to calculate the mean temperature.
en-EN.df3: Main current: this column corresponds to first flux in the onsager matrix (e.g. the energy current).
en-EN.df4: Additional current: Additional current for multi-component fluids. If the fluid has N diffusive components, you must provide N-1 independent currents. The units are not important, since they simplify in the formula. For example, the center of mass velocity of N-1 components. Non-diffusive currents can be useful to reduce noise by making the spectrum less powerful.
en-EN.fslide: F* selector: slide to select F* or enter the value, then click Resample
en-EN.pstar_cmt: The default value is obtained from the Akaike Information Criterion
en-EN.export_fail_t: Cannot save numpy data to file "{}"
en-EN.display_error_t: Unable to show a preview of this file.
en-EN.invalid_format_t: The file that you have selected has an invalid format!
en-EN.file_not_exist_t: The file that you have selected doesn't exists!
en-EN.no_file_t: You must select a data file!
en-EN.only_one_T: You can't assign more than one time the value "Temperature"
en-EN.only_one_E: You must assign only one "Energy current" value
en-EN.only_one_Volume: You must assign only one "Volume" value
en-EN.only_one_DT: You must assign only one "DT_FS" value
en-EN.no_key_t: ou must select almost one header key!
en-EN.fw_low: Filter width can't be less than 0
en-EN.automatic_T: The temperature will be automatically calculated
en-EN.automatic_V: The volume will be automatically calculated
en-EN.automatic_DT: The DT_FS will be automatically calculated
en-EN.back_reset_t:
Save changes?
If reopen the same file
the values that you chosed will not be deleted!
